items.sentence: Would you like some more salt on your popcorn?
Would you like to walk to the station with me?
Would you please have a look at this document?
I don\'t think Tom would mind if you did that.
I don\'t think that I need to worry about Tom.
I don\'t think that Tom knows what that means.
They told Tom to stop doing what he was doing.
Tom is a friend of my wife\'s younger brother.
I thought you might be able to give me a hand.
I want to find out if Tom was at school today.
